sentences.en: Facing each other, the giraffes were managing to entwine their necks in the most astonishing manner.
sentences.cn: 长颈鹿正面对面地用力将脖子缠绕在一起，那种姿势令人大为惊诧。

sentences.en: His dazed eyes stare at the eels, which still writhe and entwine.
sentences.cn: 他茫然地盯着仍在翻滚缠绕的鳗鱼。

sentences.en: Honeysuckle will entwine round the stick as it grows.
sentences.cn: 忍冬会缠绕着竿子生长.

sentences.en: How does your this individual resemble a devil I do not put same entwine!
sentences.cn: 你这个人怎么像魔鬼一样缠住我不放啊!

sentences.en: Once, years ago, he told me our lives should entwine.
sentences.cn: 多年前，他曾经对我说我们应该生活在一起。

sentences.en: She knows how to entwine herself in your affections.
sentences.cn: 她懂得如何紧紧缠住你的心.

sentences.en: The plant will entwine round the stick as it grows.
sentences.cn: 这种植物会缠绕着竿子生长.

sentences.en: The problem of the silk thread sort that entwine surround I!
sentences.cn: 那纠缠着的丝线般的问题将我环绕!

sentences.en: The relation of the literature and history were presented by way of entwine mutually of sophisticate.
sentences.cn: 文学与历史的关系是以一种复杂的相互纠缠的方式呈现出来的.

sentences.en: The whose livings to entwine the whose dies.
They walked together with their arms entwined.
To twist together or entwine into a confusing mass; snarl.
sentences.cn: 缠住卷在一起或缠卷成一大团; 卷住.
使你永远像你这样美丽.

trans.tran_en: to twist two things together or to wind one thing around another
